roleset.note: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls occurrence-48.3, appear-48.1.1.

example.name: because this develops on its own
example.text: the development of a vigorous private sector

example.text: the European TV industry 's sluggish development .

example.text: the tumor's development in salivary glands in rats.

example.name: both args, arg2 POSS
example.text: his development of a condition believed to be autism.
example.arg: of a condition believed to be autism

roleset.name: create

role.descr: final product, if separate from arg1

roles.note: This frame differs from develop.02 in that arg4 is no longer "attribute/secondary predicatation" (the args that appeared to cover may be coverd by argms such as PRP, it turns out, and will probably not occur here in their own nodes anyway), but is now a final product, as final products separate from arg1 showed up in several examples.

roleset.note: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls build-26.1, grow-26.2.

example.text: the development of a product from sketches or drawings to being a manufactured entity.
